value.title: StarCraft 2: BUT... WHY?! soO's WINGS OF LIBERTY Only Challenge! (Best-of-5)
value.excerpt: Best-of-5 series of StarCraft 2 between ByuN (Terran) and soO (Zerg). It turns out soO is basically doing a Wings of Liberty challenge, refusing to make any Lurkers, Ravagers, Vipers and Swarm Hosts.
